content_config.heading: Show Mnemonics
content_config.description: While not required, writing down your 12 word mnemonic phrase provides an additional backup in case you forget your PIN.

content_config.heading: Authorize Device with Mnemonics
content_config.description: Authorize current device by using mnemonics.

content_config.heading: Add Another Device
content_config.description: Scan QR Code to add another device.

content_config.heading: Authorize Browser Session
content_config.description: Scan QR Code to authorize browser session.

content_config.heading: Show Device QR Code
content_config.description: Scan QR Code from the device authorized device to authorize this device.

content_config.heading: Enable Biometrics
content_config.description: Use biometrics to authorize new Sessions and to confirm high value transactions.

content_config.heading: Disable Biometrics
content_config.description: Turn off biometrics and use PIN to authorize new Sessions and to confirm high value transactions.
